TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChartArea extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示图表图像上的图表区域。

span.span: Represents a chart area on the chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在任意给定的图表中， *内部绘图位置* 是在绘制数据点的 x 和 y 轴内的矩形区域。Within any given chart, the *inner plot position* is the rectangular area, inside the x and y-axis lines, where the data points are drawn. *绘图位置*是包含内部绘图位置、刻度线和轴标签的矩形区域。The *plot position* is the rectangular area that encompasses the inner plot position, the tick marks, and the axis labels. *图表区*是一个矩形区域，该区域包含图表上的绘图位置、刻度线、轴标签和轴标题。The *chart area* is the rectangular area that encompasses the plot position, the tick marks, the axis labels and the axis titles on the chart. 图表区由 类表示; 对象存储在 类中。A chart area is represented by a class; objects are stored in the class. 可在图表区域中绘制的图表序列的数目不受限制。The number of chart series that can be plotted in a chart area is unlimited. 一个 对象：A object: - 使用一个不同的内部绘图区。Uses one distinct inner plotting area. - 用于绘制一个或多个图表序列。Is used to plot one or more chart series. - 具有主 x 和 y 轴，饼图和圆环图类型除外。Has primary and secondary x and y-axes, except for pie and doughnut chart types. 使用形状图表类型（包括饼图、圆环图、漏斗图、棱锥图、极坐标图和雷达图）时，内部绘图位置将定义图表类型形状的大小。When you use Shape chart types, which includes pie, doughnut, funnel, pyramid, polar, and radar charts, the inner plotting position defines the size of the chart type shape. 例如，如果您在饼图上增加了属性的值 ，则将增加饼图的半径。For example, when you increase the value of the property on a pie chart, you will increase the radius of the pie shape. 对于所有其他图表类型，每个图表区具有两组 X 轴和 Y 轴（主要和辅助）。For all other chart types, each chart area has two sets of X- and Y-axes, primary and secondary. 若要访问与这些轴相关的属性，请使用 、 和 属性。To access properties related to these axes, use the , , and properties. 如果需要设置影响图表上所有轴的属性，请使用 属性。If you need to set a property that affects all axes on the chart, use the property. 一个或多个序列与图表区相关联。One or more series are associated with a chart area. 序列包含一个 属性，该属性确定每个序列所属的图表区。The series has a property that determines the chart area that each series belongs to. 默认情况下，序列连接到默认图表区。By default, the series is connected to the default chart area. 若要禁用序列的显示，请将 序列的属性设置为长度为零的字符串。To disable the display of a series, set the property of that series to a zero-length string. 如果将其他图表区添加到图表中，则可以将任何序列与新的图表区相关联。If another chart area is added to the chart, you can associate any series with the new chart area. 在所有形状图表类型以及条形图和堆积条形图类型中，每个序列都必须在单独的图表区域中进行绘制。In all Shape chart types, as well as bar and stacked bar chart types, each series must be plotted in a separate chart area. 在所有其他图表类型中，可以将多个序列组合到同一个图表区域中。In all other chart types, multiple series can be combined in the same chart area. 三维图表按图表区域的区域显示。A 3D chart is displayed on a chart area-by-chart area basis. 您可以使用 属性在三维中启用和自定义图表。You can use the property to enable and customize your chart in 3D. 如果添加新数据，将不会自动重新计算图表区的最小值和最大值，因此，图表不会自动更改轴大小。The chart area minimum and maximum will not be automatically recalculated if you add new data, so the chart will not automatically change axis sizes. 您可以通过使用方法，要求图表区重新计算这些值 。You can require the chart area to recalculate these values by using the method. 若要垂直对齐多个图表区，请设置 属性。To align multiple chart areas vertically, set the property. 若要水平对齐多个图表区，必须首先使用属性定位图表区 ，然后将 属性设置为水平。To align multiple chart areas horizontally, you must first position the chart areas using the property, and then set the property to Horizontal. 若要禁止显示序列，请将序列的 属性设置为长度为零的字符串。To suppress the display of a series, set the property of that series to a zero-length string.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 强烈建议使用 `Add` `Insert` collection 属性的或方法之一 来在运行时添加图表区。It is highly recommended that you use one of the `Add` or `Insert` methods of the collection property to add a chart area at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name for the new object.

summary.span: 用指定的图表区域名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified chart area name.

summary.span: 获取或设置图表区域的对齐方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment orientation of a chart area.
An enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用 、 和 属性，可以将两个或更多个图表区域水平对齐、垂直对齐或同步。Through the use of the , and properties, it is possible to align or synchronize two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both. 首先，将 属性设置为对象的名称 。First, set the property to the name of a object. 然后，将根据 设置（用于定义要使用的对齐方式）和 设置（定义应用于设置对齐方式的图表区的元素）对齐此图表区。This chart area will then be aligned, based on the setting, which defines the alignment to use, and the setting, which defines the elements of the chart area that should be used to set the alignment. 如果 未设置该属性，则不会对齐图表区，而与 和 设置无关。If the property is not set, the chart area will not be aligned, regardless of the and settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AreaAlignmentStyles AlignmentStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AreaAlignmentStyles get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AreaAlignmentStyles value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的对齐样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment style of the .

value.span: 一个 枚举值，它可表示单个值或按位“或”组合的多个值，该值定义要使用的对齐方式。

span.span: An enumeration value that can represent either a single value or the bitwise-OR of multiple values that define the alignment to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可水平、垂直或同时对齐两个或多个图表区。Use the property to align two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both. 对齐类型是以下值之一，或以下值的按位 "或" 组合。The alignment type is one of the following values, or a bitwise OR combination of the values below. |成员名称Member Name|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |全部All|图表区域使用所有值进行对齐。Chart areas are aligned using all values.| |AxesViewAxesView|使用指定的视图对齐图表区 。Chart areas are aligned using the view of the specified .| |无None|图表区域不会自动对齐。Chart areas are not automatically aligned.| |位置Position|图表区与 指定的图表区的对齐。Chart areas are aligned with the of the chart area specified.| |InnerPlotPositionInnerPlotPosition|图表区与 指定的图表区的对齐。Chart areas are aligned with the of the chart area specified.| 如果 未设置该值，则 属性将不起作用。If the value is not set, the property will have no effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置此图表区域应与之对齐的 对象的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the object to which this chart area should be aligned.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示此图表区域应与之对齐的 对象的名称。

span.span: A value that represents the name of a object to which this chart area should be aligned.
The default is the empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用 、 和 属性，可以将两个或更多个图表区域水平对齐、垂直对齐或同步。Through the use of the , and properties, it is possible to align or synchronize two or more chart areas horizontally, vertically or both. 首先，将 属性设置为对象的名称 。First, set the property to the name of a object. 然后，将根据 设置（用于定义要使用的对齐方式）和 设置（定义应用于设置对齐方式的图表区的元素）对齐此图表区。This chart area will then be aligned, based on the setting, which defines the alignment to use, and the setting, which defines the elements of the chart area that should be used to set the alignment. 如果 未设置该属性，则不会对齐图表区，而与 和 设置无关。If the property is not set, the chart area will not be aligned, regardless of the and settings.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象，该对象用于为图表区域中的所有序列实现三维效果。

span.span: Gets or sets a object, which is used to implement 3D for all series in a chart area.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象为图表区域中绘制的所有序列实现三维效果。

span.span: A object that implements 3D for all series plotted in a chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要为图表区启用或禁用3D，请设置 属性。To enable or disable 3D for a chart area, set the property. 在三维绘制图表时，轴上不支持刻度分隔线。When the chart is drawn in 3D, scale breaks are not supported on the axis.

summary.span: 获取或设置表示图表区域中所有轴的数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array that represents all axes for a chart area.

value.span: 对象的数组，该数组表示图表区域使用的所有轴。

span.span: An array of objects that represents all axes used by a chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的主要用途是在设计时提供对 X、Y、X2 和 Y2 轴的属性的访问。The main purpose of this property is to provide access to the properties of the X, Y, X2 and Y2 axes at design time. 在运行时，应使用各个轴属性（例如、等）访问图表区的轴 。At run time, the axes for a chart area should be accessed using the individual axis properties, such as , , and so forth. 如果决定在运行时使用此属性（例如，在事件中），可以通过指定 枚举成员作为标识符来访问此数组中的项。If you decide to use this property at run time - for example, in an event - you can access an item in this array by specifying an enumeration member as the identifier.

value.span: 表示主 X 轴的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the primary X-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以操作图表区域中的主 X 轴。Use this property to manipulate the primary X-axis in the chart area.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of a object.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果为背景指定了渐变颜色，则该值将为第一个使用的颜色。The value will be the first color used if you have specified gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制颜色的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为 "透明"-也就是说，如果使用 alpha 值0，则不会将颜色分配给图表区域的背景。If you set this color to "transparent" - that is, if you use an alpha value of 0 - no color will be assigned to the background of the chart area. 因此，背景将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

summary.span: 获取或设置图表区域的背景渐变方向，还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a chart area, and also determines whether or not a gradient is used.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定图表区是否将显示渐变，并确定渐变的方向（如果使用）。Use the property to determine whether a chart area will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅 枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: - 用属性设置图表区背景的主要颜色 。Set the primary color of the chart area background with the property. - 用属性设置图表区背景的辅助颜色 。Set the secondary color of the chart area background with the property. - 将此 属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的阴影样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a object.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定类型的画笔使用的阴影模式 。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影模式包含纯色背景色和在背景上绘制的线条。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用阴影样式的列表，请参阅 枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 阴影线的颜色由 属性确定。The color of hatching lines is determined by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的背景图像的路径 ，可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a , and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位图像，请使用 和 属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 还可以通过设置属性，将图像显示的一种颜色指定为 "透明" 。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 图像是 .NET Framework 支持的任何有效图形文件，包括图标。An image be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性，如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

summary.span: 获取或设置 背景图像的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of a background image.
A enumeration value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图表区的背景图像的对齐方式，并且仅当 属性设置为时才应用 。This property determines the alignment of the background image for the chart area, and is only applied when the property is set to . 有关可用对齐方式的详细信息，请参阅 枚举主题。For more information about the available alignments, see the enumeration topic.

span.span: Gets or sets the color of a object background image that will be drawn as transparent.
A value.
The default value is .

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of a object.
A enumeration value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定图像的显示方式; 图像可以平铺、缩放等。The property determines how the image is displayed; the image can be tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，则该图像将进行拉伸以适合图表区域的边界。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart area. 如果图像已平铺，则会从图表区域的左上角开始重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart area. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅 枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则绘制图像的位置由 属性设置确定。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color for the background of a object.
A value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性是多个相关属性中的一个，用于确定对象的辅助背景色 ，并在应用渐变颜色时使用。This property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 可以设置 为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则 属性将确定图表区阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the chart area. 若要为图表区域的背景使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors for the background of a chart area: - 用属性设置主色 。Set the primary color with the property. - 用属性设置辅助颜色 。Set the secondary color with the property. - 将 属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set the property to the desired gradient style.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a object.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将属性设置 为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set the property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 对于饼图或圆环图，如果在饼图或圆环外绘制数据标签，则此属性将确定曲线和水平线的颜色，即，如果 `LabelStyle` 自定义属性设置为 "外部"。For pie and doughnut charts, this property determines the color of radial and horizontal lines if data labels are drawn outside the pie or doughnut - that is, if the `LabelStyle` custom property is set to "Outside". 如果将 `ShowMarkerLines` 自定义属性设置为，则此属性还将确定3d 图表的标记线 `true` 。This property also determines the marker lines for 3D charts if the `ShowMarkerLines` custom property is set to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of a object.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定图表区域的边框样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定要用于边框的线条样式。The property determines the line style to use for a border. 该行可以是纯色、点线等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. 有关其他边框样式，请参阅 枚举主题。For other border styles, see the enumeration topic.

span.span: An value that determines the border width, in pixels, of the chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意， 属性还可以为折线图、以线条样式显示的自定义图例项等设置线条的宽度。Note that the property can also set the width of lines for line charts, custom legend items displayed with a line style, and so forth.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float32 GetSeriesDepth(class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series series) cil managed
Public Function GetSeriesDepth (series As Series) As Single

span.span: The for which the depth is retrieved.

summary.span: 返回图表区域中 的深度。

span.span: Returns the depth of a in a chart area.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值表示指定 的深度，以图表区域深度的百分比来度量。

span.span: A value that represents the depth of the specified , which is measured as a percentage of the chart area's depth.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可获取指定序列的深度。Call this method to get the depth of a specified series. 返回的值以图表区域深度的百分比来度量，它是属性中使用的度量单位 。The returned value is measured as a percentage of the chart area's depth, which is the same unit of measurement used in the property. 所有序列都具有深度，而不考虑其图表类型。All series have a depth, regardless of their chart type. 例如，即使不使用整个深度绘制点或气泡，甚至点和气泡系列也有深度。For example, even point and bubble series have a depth, even though the entire depth is not used to draw the points or bubbles. 序列的深度可用于确定自定义绘图例程中使用的点的 Z 值。The depth of a series can be used to determine a Z value for a point that is used in a custom drawing routine. > [!NOTE] > 自定义三维绘图中使用的任何点都必须使用方法从相对三维坐标转换为相对2D 坐标 。Any points used in custom 3D drawing must be transformed from relative 3D coordinates to relative 2D coordinates using the method. 若要从轴获取相对 X 和 Y 值，请对 x 轴和 y 轴使用方法。To get relative X and Y-values from an axis, use the method for both the X and Y axes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float32 GetSeriesZPosition(class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series series) cil managed
Public Function GetSeriesZPosition (series As Series) As Single

param.name: series
param.span: 检索其 Z 位置的 。

span.span: The for which the Z position is retrieved.

summary.span: 返回序列的 Z 位置，它对自定义绘图非常有用。

span.span: Returns the Z position of a series, which is useful for custom drawing.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值表示指定序列的 Z 位置，以图表区域深度的百分比来度量。

span.span: A value that represents the Z position of the specified series, which is measured as a percentage of the depth of a chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可获取序列的 Z 位置。Call this method to get the Z position of a series. Z 位置从图表区的背面墙到数据序列的中心进行测量，以图表区域深度的百分比表示。The Z position is measured from the back wall of the chart area to the center of a data series, and is represented as a percentage of the chart area's depth. 例如，在 Z 轴上绘制的一系列数据的 Z 位置为50。For example, a series that is drawn halfway along the Z-axis has a Z position of 50. 序列的 Z 位置通常用于自定义绘图例程。The Z position of a series is normally used for a custom drawing routine. > [!NOTE] > 自定义三维绘图中使用的任何点都必须使用方法从相对三维坐标转换为相对2D 坐标 。Any points used in custom 3D drawing must be transformed from relative 3D coordinates to relative 2D coordinates using the method. 若要从轴获取相对 X 和 Y 值，请对 x 轴和 y 轴使用方法。To get relative X and Y-values from an axis, use the method for both the X and Y axes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ InnerPlotPosition { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::ElementPosition ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象，该对象定义图表区域对象的内部绘图位置。

span.span: Gets or sets an object, which defines the inner plot position of a chart area object.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象定义 对象的内部绘图位置。

span.span: An object, which defines the inner plot position of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义用于绘制数据的图表区元素内的矩形; 它不包括刻度线和轴标签等。The property defines the rectangle within a chart area element that is used for plotting data; it excludes tick marks, axis labels, and so forth. 用于此属性的坐标 (0，0到 100100) 与 对象相关，而不是与整个对象相关 。The coordinates used for this property (0,0 to 100,100) are related to the object, and not to the entire . 属性可用于对齐多个图表区。The property can be used to align multiple chart areas. 但是，如果一个图表区有刻度线和轴标签，而另一个图表区不存在，则无法对齐它们的轴线。However, if one chart area has tick marks and axis labels and another one does not, their axis lines cannot be aligned. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此属性还可用于更改图表（例如饼图或圆环图）的大小，而无需更改生成的图表图像的大小。This property can also be used to change the size of charts, such as pie or doughnut, without changing the size of the generated chart image. 若要更改整个对象的位置， 请改用 属性。To change the position of an entire object use the property instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定相关图表区域轴的标签大小是否相等。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines if the labels of the relevant chart area axes are of equal size.

value.span: 如果将其 属性设置为的所有轴 都将使用相同的字号显示其标签，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if all axes that have their property set to will display their labels using the same font size; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体大小由控件自动计算 ，并使用最大大小。The font size is automatically calculated by the control, with the largest size that fits being used. 此属性适用于其属性设置为的所有图表区轴 `true` 。This property applies to all chart area axes that have their property set to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的唯一名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique name of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示 对象的名称。

span.span: A value that represents the name of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的名称 必须是唯一的，否则将引发异常。The name of a object must be unique, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 从对象中检索对象时，此属性可用作索引器 。This property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a object from the object. 如果将此属性设置为长度为零的字符串。If you set this property to a zero-length string. 将引发异常。an exception will be thrown.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 对象，该对象定义 对象在 内的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that defines the position of a object within the .

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象定义某个图表区域对象在图表图像内的位置。

span.span: An object that defines the position of a chart area object within the chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义对象在中的位置 ，包括刻度线、轴标签等。This property defines the position of a object within the , and includes tick marks, axis labels, and so forth. 用于此属性的坐标 (0，0到 100100) 与整个图表图像相关。The coordinates used for this property (0,0 to 100,100) are related to the entire chart image.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RecalculateAxesScale() cil managed

summary.span: 在 事件中对图表进行更改之后，重新计算图表区域的属性。

span.span: Recalculates the properties of the chart area after changes have been made to the chart in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用 事件进行更改，有时需要重新计算图表区属性，以便正确呈现图表。If you use the event to make changes, it is sometimes necessary to recalculate chart area properties so that the chart is rendered correctly. 例如，如果更改了轴范围，则必须重新计算该轴的标签。For example, if an axis range is changed, the labels for that axis must be recalculated. 使用 事件对图表区域进行任何更改后，调用此方法。Call this method after you use the event to make ANY changes to a chart area.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的阴影颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of a object.
A value.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。This property can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用于实现 "真实" 阴影效果;对于阴影，尝试使用颜色值 "128，0，0，0"。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，请将 属性设置为非零值 (0) 。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a object.

value.span: 表示图表区域阴影偏移量的 （以像素为单位）。

span.span: An that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现隐藏，请使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致阴影向下移动并向右移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 负值将导致阴影向左移动和向左移动。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标志设置为 `false` ，则与图表区关联的所有序列、图例、标题和批注对象也将隐藏。When this flag is set to `false`, all series, legends, titles and annotation objects associated with the chart area will also be hidden.
